definition: Hongwu Emperor, also written Hung-wu Ti, reign name of first Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1] (1328-1398), reigned 1386-1398, Temple name 明太祖[Ming2 Tai4 zu3]
flood/big/great
surname Hong
martial/military
surname Wu

sentences.english: Zhenyuan ordained at East Bridge in rivers and mountains, was built in the Ming Dynasty Hongwu years.
sentences.chinese: 位於鎮遠縣城東中河山，始建於明朝洪武年間。

sentences.english: Jinxiang historical development of the key is to be built home Wei twenty Hongwu.
sentences.chinese: 金鄉歷史發展的關鍵，是置衛築需洪武二十年。

sentences.english: In 1368, Chu Yuanzhang established Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 公元1368年，朱元璋建立明朝，建元洪武。

sentences.english: Tibetan lamas began to live in the capital from Hongwu period of Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 藏族喇嘛僧人留住京城始於明初洪武年間。

definition: Ming Taizu, Temple name of first Ming emperor Hongwu 洪武[Hong2 wu3]
reign name of Ming emperor (1573-1619)
Hongzhi Emperor, reign name of ninth Ming emperor 朱祐樘[Zhu1 You4 tang2] (1470-1505), reigned 1487-1505, Temple name 明孝宗[Ming2 Xiao4 zong1]
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
Yongle Emperor, reign name of third Ming emperor Zhu Di 朱棣[Zhu1 Di4] (1360-1424), reigned 1403-1424, Temple name 明成祖[Ming2 Cheng2 zu3]
Xuande Emperor, reign name of fifth Ming emperor Zhu Zhanji 朱瞻基[Zhu1 Zhan1 ji1] (1398-1435), reigned 1426-1436, Temple name 明宣宗[Ming2 Xuan1 zong1]
Ming Chengzu, Temple name of third Ming Emperor Yongle 永樂|永乐[Yong3 le4]
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)
tomorrow morning/the following morning
Jianwen Emperor, reign name of second Ming Emperor Zhu Yunwen 朱允炆[Zhu1 Yun3 wen2] (1377-1402), reigned 1398-1402
Ming Wuzong, temple name of eleventh Ming emperor Zhengde 正德[Zheng4 de2]
early years
Hongxi Emperor, reign name of fourth Ming emperor Zhu Gaochi 朱高熾|朱高炽[Zhu1 Gao1 chi4] (1378-1425), reigned (1424-1425), Temple name 明仁宗[Ming2 Ren2 zong1]
reign name of second Qing emperor (1644-1662)
Chongzhen, reign name of last Ming emperor (1628-1644)
Temple name of fifth Ming emperor Xuande 宣德[Xuan1 de2]
